issue.title: Lost BLACS window after compile and restart

content.raw: This isn’t a proper fix and maybe they’ve already tried it, but windows has hotkeys to move a window around multiple desktops that works even when magic’d off-screen. Simply get focus \(click taskbar entry\) and use the Windows key with arrow keys to move it around until it gets to a screen that is visible. It’s saved me from this kind of problem many times in the past.
content.html: This isn’t a proper fix and maybe they’ve already tried it, but windows has hotkeys to move a window around multiple desktops that works even when magic’d off-screen. It’s saved me from this kind of problem many times in the past.
